Package gchess

Interface GChessAPI

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GChess

    public interface GChessAPI

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void startNewPlayerVsAiGame​(GameMode mode, Alliance playerAlliance, int aiDifficulty, UI ui)
      This function starts a new player vs ai game.
      void startNewPlayerVsPlayerGame​(GameMode mode, UI ui)
      This function starts a new game of player vs player.

    • Method Detail

      • startNewPlayerVsPlayerGame

        void startNewPlayerVsPlayerGame​(GameMode mode,
                                UI ui)
                         throws UnknownGameMode
        This function starts a new game of player vs player.
        Parameters:
        mode - The game mode, e.g CLASSIC, CHESS960, THREE_CHECK etc.
        ui - The user interface of the two players.
        Throws:
        UnknownGameMode - When an unknown game mode is sent as a parameter this exception is thrown.
        See Also:
        UI

      • startNewPlayerVsAiGame

        void startNewPlayerVsAiGame​(GameMode mode,
                            Alliance playerAlliance,
                            int aiDifficulty,
                            UI ui)
                     throws GChessThrowable
        This function starts a new player vs ai game.
        Parameters:
        mode - The game mode, e.g CLASSIC, CHESS960, THREE_CHECK etc.
        playerAlliance - The human player alliance (BLACK or WHITE).
        aiDifficulty - The difficulty of the ai.
        ui - The user interface of the human player.
        Throws:
        GChessThrowable - This exception is thrown whenever the game-mode is unknown or the ai difficulty is unknown.
